Title: I will fix core web vitals issues , fix lcp issues, fix cls issues for wordpress
Description:
I will fix the 
Core Web Vitals issue
 (CLS, LCP, FID) to optimize your website speed and ranking on google.
What is core web vitals?
Core web vitals are a set of the three individual metrics that are wrapped up in the overall page experience: 
Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)
Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)
First Input Delay (FID)
These are a set of signals that Google will measure to evaluate the page experience for a user
Why core web vitals are important?
Google Announced in 2021 That they are Ranking Websites on google related to your Core web Vitals and Website's Speed. and Google says: "Fix poor user experiences on your site"
We will offer:
Fix Cumulative Layout Shift {CLS}
Fix FCP (First Contentful Paint)
FIx Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)
Fix FID (First Input Delay)
Quick loading. 
Browser Caching
Lazy loading
Fix core web
HTML, CSS & JS Minification
Image Optimization 
Minimizing total requests
Database Cleaning
Why Me?

High quality work until 100% satisfaction
Money-back guarantee

15 day free support

Title: I will configure wordpress multisite setup with all domain mapping
Description:
Having a deep understanding of WordPress and working as a Senior WordPress developer, teaching youngsters as the next WordPress developers, I have shown quality expertise in Multisite networks too. I know about the database structure and tables involved in multisite, you will find me one of the best to customize or create a multisite website for your business.
Multisite is a feature that allows you to create a network of subsites within a single site. So that you can access all your site from one Dashboard Control Panel. This network shares a file system, database, and are typically variations of the same domain.
You can use multisite as a service for your customers. Think about you know a lot of artists and they don't have a website, here is the opportunity for you, just get a Multisite setup and use it for different purposes. Sell your multisite platform to each of the artists you know and charge them flat fees every month. It's that simple!
Feel free to contact me if you have any questions. I will be happy to help by sharing my expertise.
Thank you!
